bibl.title: Mummies and mummification.
bibl.note: The current state of research. - General knowledge and general prejudice. - Mummies from cemeteries in the Kharga and Dakhla oases. - Gilding the skin: Gold, the 'flesh' of gods. - Mummification as a question of cost. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Christina Riggs (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt (Oxford, 2012) pp. 664-683, 2 figg.

The current state of research. - General knowledge and general prejudice. - Mummies from cemeteries in the Kharga and Dakhla oases. - Gilding the skin: Gold, the 'flesh' of gods. - Mummification as a question of cost. - Conclusion.
